title: Spilled Milk
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:betterfootnotes]]
[[div style="display: none"]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:flopstyle]]
[[/div]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:broken-masquerade]]

[[module CSS]]
 @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=EB+Garamond:ital,wght@0,600;0,800;1,600&display=swap);

/* HEADER AREA */
 :root {
	--accentColor: hsl(0, 0%, 0%);
	--moo: hsl(214, 70%, 45%);
	--fnColor: hsl(0, 100%, 42%);
}

 body {
	--barColour: var(--accentColor);
}

 #page-title {
	display: none;
}

 .meta-title {
	color: var(--accentColor);
}

 .meta-title,
 .pseudocrumbs {
	text-align: center;
}

/* CONTENT AREA */
 .moo,
 a.moo:visited {
	color: var(--moo);

	font-weight: bold;
	transition: color .2s cubic-bezier(.77, 0, .18, 1);
}

 a.moo,
 a.moo:visited {
	padding-bottom: 2px;

	border-bottom: thin solid var(--moo);
}

 a.moo:hover,
 a.moo:visited:hover {
	padding-bottom: 2px;

	color: var(--linkColour);
	background: var(--moo);

	text-decoration: none;
}

 .mindscape {
	margin: 0 0 2.4rem;
	padding: 2.4rem;

	color: hsl(227, 75%, 20%);
	background-image:
	   radial-gradient(
		hsl(256, 63%, 81%) 60%,
		hsl(233, 34%, 66%));
	border: 12px double hsl(247, 41%, 43%);

	text-align: center;
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:info-ayers
|lang=en
|page=no-sense-crying
|authorPage=/floppyphoenix
|comments=**Spilled Milk** 
**By:** [[*user Lt Flops]] 
**Published on 13 Mar 2020** 
 
This article is set in the **[*/broken-masquerade-hub Broken Masquerade Hub]**. 
This article was written for **[*/144-hour-jam-contest-two 144-Hour Jam Contest Two (2020)]**. 
----
[[include :scp-wiki:more-by:lt-flops]]
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[div class="meta-title"]]
Spilled Milk
[[/div]]

[[div class="pseudocrumbs"]]
[[[Canon Hub]]] >> [[[Broken Masquerade Hub]]] >> Spilled Milk
[[/div]]

= //A voicemail sent by one// **Chaz Ambrose** //of// **Ambrose Restaurants** //to an unknown party about a partnership with// [[a href="*/scp-3739" class="moo"]]Moosphere, Incorporated[[/a]].

[[div class="blockquote justified"]]
Andy! Hey mate, it's Chaz!

So, I got the MC&D shareholders together for one final board meeting, right? And some were, well, still a tad skeptical of the whole thing. I'm telling you: I haven't had that much difficulty giving a pitch since cookery school, heh heh! I got a hold of a few Oneiric representatives who, luckily, were more than willing to spin their dreams into day for us. They'll be able to ease along our partnership with those secretive Moo... Those moo fellows. Can't recall their name, sorry!

We've been working on the insurance angle -- can't seem to get that sorted out yet, sadly -- but I'm telling you, we'll have this all set up within six, maybe twelve weeks, by the latest!

Andy? 2025's our bloody year! That's right -- Ambrose is setting up shop in the Mindscapes, baby!
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

= //Six, maybe twelve weeks later. Soft opening for Ambrose Mindscape.//

[[div class="mindscape" style="word-break: normal;"]]
  [[span style="font: 360%/1.8rem "EB Garamond", serif; font-weight: 800"]]AMBROSE MINDSCAPE[[/span]]

  [[span style="font: 180%/.9rem "EB Garamond", serif; font-style: italic; font-weight: 600"]]~in partnership with~[[/span]]

  [[span class="moo" style="font: 240%/1.2rem "EB Garamond", serif; font-weight: 600"]]Moosphere, Inc.[[/span]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

  [[span style="font: 130% "Tahoma", sans-serif"]]
For more than [UNKNOWN] long Ages, [[span class="moo"]]Moosphere, Incorporated[[/span]] has been a forerunner in surrealistic dairy artisanship; a feast for more than 30 BILLION souls and counting! By the fruits of their very spirits, our well-trained Oneiric confectioneers would like to serve you our many fresh, EGO-SHATTERING delights. Mouth-watering cuisine is hard-coded in their DNA -- we're sure of it! Feed your chakric affirmations, O vaccimulgent one!

For your benefit, **Ambrose Restaurant** has selected 100 lucky folks from the Free Ports catchment area to come and feast!

JOIN US!
  [[/span]]

  [[span style="font: 80% "Tahoma", sans-serif"]]
Please note: The True Name listed on your Library Card is required to enter. 
Don't forget to leave a review!
  [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[=]]
+ [[span style="color: var(--keyColor)"]]REVIEWS[[/span]]
//[[span style="font-size: 120%;"]]The latest customer reviews, powered by [[span style="color: blue; font-weight: bold;"]]Void[[/span]]!
Join in the discussion with [[span style="color: blue; font-weight: bold;"]]#ambrosemindscape[[/span]]![[/span]]//
[[/=]]

|hums=790

]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=magic-fish.jpg
|username=The Cosmic Fish
|handle=virtuallight
|void-msg=I've taken Ways to Ambrose Restaurants many times in the past. You guys have access to some of the finest cuisine the paranormal market has to offer. And you've always been very accessible to my needs, even in my current form. But this time, did you guys even do your research? Dude, you partnered with MOOSPHERE? Do you even know what these guys DO TO SAPIENTS? You eat their dairy products and they suck your mind THROUGH A NON-BIODEGRADABLE STRAW! [[span class="vactivity"]]#ambrosemindscape[[/span]]@@ @@
|echoes=159
|hums=238
|time-and-date=12:01 PM ¬∑ 12 March 2025
]]

[[div class="blockquote justified"]]
//Following a tip-off to a Foundation Site, [[[task-forces#mu-13|Mobile Task Force Mu-13]]] ("Ghostbusters") was alerted to the nearest Mindscape nexus gate and commenced a raid at the conceptual corner of Surreptitious and Scrumptious. At the supposed location of Ambrose Mindscape, no conscious activity was detected.//

//MTF-Mu-13 remains on stand-by.//
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

= //A phone call between// **Chaz Ambrose** //and an unknown party.//

[[div class="blockquote justified"]]
...

Oi Andy, it's Chaz. I'm calling because...

We've had some, er, growing pains, in a manner of speaking. No no, it's okay. It's cool. I totally get your vibe. Just, breathe for a sec.

... 

You good now? All right.

So anyway, like I said last time, I've just been having //the worst// headache lately. ... What's that? Oh, it's nothing. I spoke with my new shrink, Marcie, she says it's just my anxiety flaring up again. No ‚Äú[[[*/scp-5990|raving sub-mariner extrusion]]]‚Äù or whatever hysteria's struck the news again. Seriously, nothing to panic about.

Right! Now, we had the place up last week, over on the conceptual corner of Surreptitious and Scrumptious, buuut... We've had irate mindscapers from all over the thought-sphere pouring into our Head Office in Portland -- er, one of 'em -- the whole weekend. All protesting over dodgy business practices or //what have you.//

I spoke with this one thoughtform, through e-mail? Friendly l'il thing, just the cutest! We chatted for a bit; said xe attended my second-ever soft opening down in SanFran, y'know, before we took the brand out East. It warmed me right up! But xe //said// that xe took issue with the way Ambrose has been //presenting ourselves// lately. Said //I, personally,// am in with the wrong crowd. Seems not many are down to //marry the dairy// yet‚Äì

Oh, you wanna know what I said? Well I told 'em, you know, ‚Äúwe respect the anomalous //community//,‚Äù right, and ‚Äúthis is our way to //give back//,‚Äù and all that. It came from the heart, you know.

I... Think I ruffled a few feathers. Like, metaphorically-speaking. Er... 'pparently I've been using the wrong word? And ‚Äúparanatural‚Äù is what we use now? It's meant to inspire strength for a diversity of //beings//, and solidarity no matter //how mundane// -- that sort of thing. 

... 

Andy, do you know what ‚Äúok noomer‚Äù means?

Sorry, I'm rambling, but what I wanted to say was, I want this to be a fresh start. I want to put my best foot forward.

I want Ambrose to do important things this year. We'll make a few hundred thousand gees, I'm sure, but I want our customers to feel appreciated. For following us all these years.

Ayup! Thanks for hearing me out, then! All right. And er, Andy? Whatever you do, //don't// look on [[span style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;"]]Void[[/span]] for a couple days.

Take care now!
[[/div]]

@@ @@
